DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Occupancy data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This file contains two tabs with occupancy data (0 = not detected, 1 = detected) from Nebraska and from Saskatchewan. Data are from upland grassland sites using 5-minute, 100-m radius point counts. Each row specifies a single visit to a single plot.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: community
grassland birds
sampling effort
occupancy modeling
research design
study design
